snippet.title: Cern scientist expects 'first glimpse' of Higgs boson
snippet.description:
Science & Environment / 7 December 2011
Next Tuesday, two separate teams will each reveal the outcome of trawling through their latest data from LHC collisions. A spokesman for one of…

snippet.title: LHC smashes beam collision record
snippet.description:
Science & Environment / 28 June 2010
Laboratory (Fermilab) in Illinois, USA, is the LHC's rival. It has operated at higher intensities, but the current collision rate is a record…

snippet.title: 'A long wait', but worth it'
snippet.description:
Science & Environment / 21 November 2009
TV, meeting MP John Denham, blinking in the glare of unaccustomed publicity, we were really nervous and excited about the LHC. The machine,…
